update.available: Phetolo e teng. Tobetsa fano go e jarolla.
update.downloaded: Phetolo e siametse go tsenngwa fa o tswa.

drop_cover.text: Tsenya phetolo fano go e tsenya

onboarding.title: Amogela!
onboarding.description_download: A re fumleng kopi ya DDLC.
onboarding.button_download: Etela leqephe la go jarolla la semmuso la DDLC
onboarding.s1_desc: O tlhoka go jarolla kopi ya Doki Doki Literature Club. E ka fumanwa kwa webosaeteng ya semmuso (ddlc.moe) - tobetsa konopo e e kwa tlase go ya teng jaanong.
onboarding.s1_platform: Fa o kōpiwa, kgetha go jarolla faele e e bidiwang "DDLC ({0})".
onboarding.s2_desc: Fa go jarolla go fedile, e kgethe o dirisa konopo e e kwa tlase.
onboarding.description_location: Dipapadi tsa gago di tla bolokwa kwa {0}

login_input.message: Tlanya aterese ya gago ya imeile
login_input.details: Imeile e tla romelwa kwa aterese e. Tobetsa khonokanyo mo imeileng go fetsa go tsena.

change_username_input.message: Tlanya leina la gago le lesha
change_username_input.details: Maina a basebelisi ga a tlhoke go nna a a kgethegileng.

uninstall_confirmation.message: A o na le bonnete jwa gore o batla go tsenolola?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Data ya gago ya boloko ya {0} e tla tloswa, mme o tla tlhoka kopi ya phetolo go e tsenya gape.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: A o na le bonnete jwa gore o batla go tlosa phetolo?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: O tla tlhoka go jarolla kopi e nngwe ya phetolo go e tsenya gape.

save_delete_confirmation.message: A o na le bonnete jwa gore o batla go tlosa data ya gago ya boloko?
save_delete_confirmation.details: O tla tshwanela go simolola {0} gape go tloga kwa tshimologong.

install.description_screenshots: Tobetsa S fa o tshameka go tsaya setshwantsho.
install.description_sdk: Phetolo e e tshegetsa ditiriso tse di kgethegileng ka Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!

install_creation.title: Tsenya DDLC
install_creation.label_existing_saves: Difaelete tsa Boloko tse di Teng
install_creation.description_vanilla: Kopi e ntle ya DDLC e tla dirwa. Data ya boloko e tla nna e farologane le kopi e nngwe le e nngwe ya papadi.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: Kopi e ntle ya DDLC e tla dirwa. Data ya boloko e tla abelanwa le dikopi tse dingwe tsa papadi (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.description_modded: Kopi ya DDLC e tla dirwa, mme phetolo e tla tsenngwa. Data ya boloko e tla nna e farologane le kopi e nngwe le e nngwe ya papadi.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: Kopi ya DDLC e tla dirwa, mme phetolo e tla tsenngwa. Data ya boloko e tla abelanwa le dikopi tse dingwe tsa papadi (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.status_exists: Foldara e e setse e le teng. Kgetha leina le lengwe la foldara.

tab_store_placeholder.title: Lebenkele le tla tloga le nna teng!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: Database ya phetolo ya Sayonika e tla tlamela ka lefelo le legolo la go abelana, go jarolla le go sekaseka diphetolo tsa DDLC. Fa Sayonika e setse e le teng mo setšhabeng, o tla kgona go batla diphetolo fano mo Doki Doki Mod Manager.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: Fa o ntse o emetse, ikutlwe o lokologile go jarolla dingwe tsa diphetolo tse di kgothaleditsweng.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Go paletswe go jarolla lenane la diphetolo. A ga o online?

tab_store.title: Sayonika Lebenkele
tab_store.subtitle: Batla o bo o jarolla diphetolo tsa DDLC
tab_store.offline_message: Ga o online. Tsweetswee tlola khonexene ya gago ya inthanete o bo o leka gape.
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Ditiriso tsa tlhomamiso ga di kgonege ka nakwana ka ntlha ya tlhokomelo. O ka kgona go batla diphetolo fela mme ga o kgone go tsena kgotsa go ikwadisa.
tab_store.no_mods_title: Ga go na diphetolo tse di fumanweng
tab_store.no_mods_message: Leka go fetola patlisiso ya gago kgotsa disefe

filters.date_created: Letsatsi le le Dirilweng ka Lona
filters.date_updated: Letsatsi le le Ntshafaditsweng ka Lona
filters.title: Setlhogo

login.title: Tsena mo Sayonika
login.username_placeholder: Tlanya leina la mosadi kgotsa aterese ya imeile
login.username_help: O ka dirisa leina la gago la mosadi kgotsa aterese ya imeile go tsena
login.register_link: Ga o na akhaonto? Ikwadise fano

translation.enabled: Phetlhelelo e dirilwe. Dikgang di tla ranolwa fa di le teng.
translation.language_changed: Puo ya phetlhelelo e fetotswe go {0}

section_backgrounds.title: Moragonyana
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Ikgatise kopi ya gago ya Doki Doki Mod Manager ka nngwe ya dibakground tse.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Dibakground tsa semmuso tsa DDLC ka bopelonomi jwa Team Salvato.

section_advanced_appearance.title: E Tlhabologile
section_advanced_appearance.subtitle: Fumana dikgetho tse dingwe tsa interface fano.
section_advanced_appearance.button_enable_sysborders: Dirisa Dikgale tsa System (e tlhoka go simololwa gape)
section_advanced_appearance.button_disable_sysborders: Tlosa Dikgale tsa System (e tlhoka go simololwa gape)

section_storage.title: Lefelo la Boloko
section_storage.subtitle: Fetola kwa data ya papadi ya gago e bolokwang teng.
section_storage.description_moving: Tlhokomelang! Fa o kgetha go fetola lefelo la go tsenya, diphetolo tsa gago tsotlhe, ditlhomamiso le data ya boloko di tla fuduswa. Se se ka tsaya metsotso e le mmalwa, mme ga se ka ke sa kgorelediwa.

section_updates.title: Diphetolo
section_updates.subtitle: Fumana kgatiso ya bosheng ya Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_sdk.title: Diphitlhelelo & SDK
section_sdk.subtitle: Fetola tsela e diphitlhelelo di tshwarwang ka yona.
section_sdk.checkbox_specified: Fa phetolo e bolela gore e a di tshegetsa

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Dirisa logging ya debug go leka diphetolo tsa gago ka Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK.

section_language.title: Puo
section_language.subtitle: Fetola puo ya Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_language.description_restart: Diphetogo tsa puo di tla dira morago ga go simolola gape application.
section_language.notification_changed: Puo e fetotswe go {0}. Tsweetswee simolola gape application go bona diphetogo.
section_language.notification_same: Puo e setse e setse e le {0}.

tab_about.title: Mabapi
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager ke porojeke e e dirilweng ke baagi e e go thusang go batla, go tsenya le go tshameka diphetolo tsa Doki Doki Literature Club, papadi ya Visual Novel ya mahala ya Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager ke tiro ya balatedi ba Doki Doki Literature Club mme ga e amane le Team Salvato. Ke tiro ya balatedi, jaaka e tlhalosiwa ke Melawana ya IP ya Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager ga e tseye boikarabelo jwa kotsi epe e e bakilweng ke difaelete tsa gago kgotsa khomphutara, ka ntlha ya go tshameka phetolo kgotsa ka tsela e nngwe. Ke boikarabelo jwa gago go netefatsa gore diphetolo di bolokesegile go di tshameka.

jumplist.task_launch: Bula Doki Doki Mod Manager o bo o simolola {0}.

running_cover.description_running: Tswala papadi go dira diphetogo mo diphetolong tsa gago.
running_cover.install_missing: Tsenyo ga e a kgona go fumanwa.
running_cover.install_corrupt: Tsenyo ga e a felela kgotsa e sentse.
running_cover.install_crashed: Papadi e paletswe go simolola kgotsa e tsere.

move_install.title: Kgetha foldara e ntšha ya go tsenya

game_browse_dialog.title: Batla kopi ya faele ya zip ya DDLC

shortcut_dialog.title: Kgetha kwa o tla bayang khutsufatso ya gago teng

exception.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager e tsere
exception.body: Bothata bo begilwe. Tsweetswee simolola gape o bo o leka gape.

move_install.title: Go paletswe go fudusa foldara ya go tsenya
move_install.body: Lekola gore o na le tetla le sebaka se se lekaneng sa go fudusetsa kwa foldareng e.

shortcut.title: Go paletswe go dira khutsufatso
shortcut.body: Lekola gore o na le tetla ya go dira difaelete mo foldareng e.

install.title: Go paletswe go tsenya papadi
install.body: Lekola gore o na le tetla le sebaka se se lekaneng sa go tsenya.

rename.title: Go paletswe go fetola leina
rename.body: Lekola gore o tswetse mananeo otlhe a a ka tsenyang letsogo o bo o leka gape.

uninstall.title: Go paletswe go tsenolola
uninstall.body: Lekola gore o tswetse mananeo otlhe a a ka tsenyang letsogo o bo o leka gape.

save_delete.title: Go paletswe go tlosa data ya boloko
save_delete.body: Lekola gore o tswetse mananeo otlhe a a ka tsenyang letsogo o bo o leka gape.

mod_delete.title: Go paletswe go tlosa phetolo
mod_delete.body: Lekola gore o tswetse mananeo otlhe a a ka tsenyang letsogo o bo o leka gape.

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager e emisitse go araba
renderer_freeze.body: Fa bothata bo bo tsaya nako e telele, tswala app o bo o simolola gape.

executable_permission.title: Go paletswe go dira gore papadi e kgone go dirisiwa
executable_permission.body: Ga go a kgona go dira DDLC.sh e kgone go dirisiwa mo Linux. Papadi e ka nna ya se ka ya simolola sentle.
